description: Moi is a small yet decidedly smart restaurant which stands out for its quality in the Fleming district in north-west Rome. With years of culinary experience behind him, Thomas uses modern techniques to prepare dishes made from fresh, seasonal ingredients which can change on a daily basis, including meat, fish, vegetables and herbs, all of which are full of flavour and reasonably priced.
